nodes.text: Porla was a Hutt from the planet of Boonta.

The Hutt was the master of Hondo Ohnaka. Around the time of the Clone Wars, Ohnaka and several other servants escaped onto Porla's skiff, taking his Ubrikkian tanks and Starhawk speeder bikes. Hondo then ventured to the planet of Florrum, where he founded a base.
